name: Times Square HoG Demo
description:
Controls:

Left mouse button to click on objects

"Alt+Enter" to enable/disable fullscreen (downloadable file only)

Objective:

Find all of the hidden objects

This was my first attempt at video game design and it took me weeks to get everything exactly the way it is. I have learned quite a bit since then and now I feel it is time to work on this some more... Right now it consists of only 2 levels/images...

List of future updates (will be striked out when completed):

More levels (at least 10)

Higher quality images (at least 1280x720, versus the current 800x600)

Better GUI (this one is admittedly crappy, but works)

Animations for clicks on correct and on incorrect objects

A scoring system, most likely time-based and per level.

Send any suggestions to cire666siuol@gmail.com

EDIT (5/22/2015): Just in case anyone's wondering, I will be updating this game fairly soon... Oh, and it's free now to download... I don't know why I tried charging... I guess just because I could...
